程序包 store

类 MedicineStore

Object
MedicineStore
public class MedicineStore extends Object
The MedicineStore class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of Medicine records. It supports loading medicine data from a CSV file, adding, removing, upserting, and retrieving medicine records.

  • 字段详细资料

    • nextId

      private static int nextId
      A static variable to keep track of the next unique identifier for medicines. It is initialized to 0 and increments each time a new medicine is added. It may be updated when loading initial data from a CSV file.

    • medicines

      private static HashMap<String,Medicine> medicines
      A static HashMap to store medicine records. The key is the medicine ID and the value is the medicine record.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MedicineStore

      public MedicineStore()

  • 方法详细资料

    • load

      public static void load(String path) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Loads medicine data from a CSV file specified by the given path. The CSV file should specify the following fields in its first row:
      • Medicine Name
      • Initial Stock
      • Low Stock Level Alert
      • Price
      The method parses each row and creates a Medicine object for each valid record.
      参数:
      path - The path to the CSV file to be loaded
      抛出:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • addRecord

      public static String addRecord(Medicine record)
      Adds a new medicine record to the store and generates a medicine ID for the record. The medicine ID is prefixed with "M" followed by a 4-digit number.
      参数:
      record - The medicine record to be added
      返回:
      The unique identifier assigned to the medicine

    • removeRecord

      public static void removeRecord(String id)
      Removes a medicine from the store based on the given ID.
      参数:
      id - The ID of the medicine record to be removed

    • updateRecord

      public static void updateRecord(String id, Medicine record)
      Upserts the record of a medicine with the given ID.
      参数:
      id - The ID of the medicine to be upserted
      record - The new medicine record

    • getRecords

      public static List<Medicine> getRecords()
      Retrieves a list of all medicine records .
      返回:
      A list of the medicine records

    • getRecord

      public static Medicine getRecord(String id)
      Retrieves a medicine record by the provided medicine ID.
      参数:
      id - The medicine ID of the medicine to be retrieved
      返回:
      The medicine record associated with the given ID, or null if no such medicine exists
